Package org.sakaiproject.jsf.renderer

This package provides Sakai specific renderers for the JavaServer Faces 1.1 Reference release.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphaIndexRenderer
    Description: Render an alphabetical index.
    AnchorReferenceRenderer
    Description: Render an anchor component with name attribute.
    AppletRenderer
    Description: Render an applet in a browser-indepemdent way Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005 Organization: Sakai Project
    ButtonBarItemRenderer  
    ButtonBarRenderer  
    CourierRenderer  
    CustomSelectOneRadioRenderer  
    DataLineRenderer
    Description: Render a iterated data like a dataTable but without the table.
    DebugRenderer  
    DocSectionRenderer  
    DocSectionTitleRenderer  
    DynaRendererBase  
    DynaTableRenderer
    Description: Render data like a dataTable but support the MultiColumn component.
    GroupBoxRenderer  
    HideDivisionRenderer
    Description: Render a stylesheet link for the value of our component's path attribute, prefixed by the context path of this web application.
    InputColorRenderer
    Description: Render the custom color picker control.
    InputDateRenderer
    Description: Render the custom color picker control.
    InputFileUploadRenderer  
    InputRichTextRenderer
    Formerly RichTextEditArea.java Renders a rich text editor and toolbar within an HTML "textarea" element.
    InstructionMessageRenderer  
    JsfContentTypeMapRenderer  
    MultiColumnRenderer
    Title: MultiColumnRenderer Description: Renderer for MultiColumn component.
    OutputDateRenderer
    OutputDateRenderer is an HTML renderer for Sakai 2.0 JSF outputDate.
    PagerRenderer  
    PeerRefreshRenderer  
    PopupRenderer
    Description:
    This class is the class that renders the popup custom tag.
    ProgressBarRenderer
    Description:
    This class is the class that renders the timerBar custom tag.
    RichTextAreaRenderer  
    RichTextEditArea
    Quick port of the Sakai rich text editor from htmlarea to FCKeditor Slight differences in path definition Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004 Sakai
    ScriptRenderer
    Description: Render a stylesheet link for the value of our component's path attribute, prefixed by the context path of this web application.
    SeparatedListRenderer  
    StylesheetRenderer
    Description: Render a stylesheet link for the value of our component's path attribute, prefixed by the context path of this web application.
    TimerBarRenderer
    Description:
    This class is the class that renders the timerBar custom tag.
    ToolBarItemRenderer  
    ToolBarMessageRenderer  
    ToolBarRenderer
    This does not render children, but can deal with children by surrounding them in a comment.
    ToolBarSpacerRenderer
    ToolBarSpacerRenderer is an HTML renderer for the Sakai ToolBarSpacer tag in JSF.
    ViewContentRenderer  
    ViewRenderer  
    ViewTitleRenderer  

Package org.sakaiproject.jsf.renderer Description

This package provides Sakai specific renderers for the JavaServer Faces 1.1 Reference release.
